1281310.name: Explorer Studio
1281310.description:
Explorer Studio is an application that allows the user to customize the visual aspects of their Windows File explorer. Users can select images, videos, or colours for the background of various parts of the file explorer while maintaining the same functionality of the default windows file manager.

** This application is meant to be used as a replacement to the default Windows file explorer app. It does NOT reskin the native Windows file explorer.**

Features


• Apply videos, images and colours to your file explorer.
• Replace your default file explorer so your custom explorer opens when you open folders.
• Upload your creations to the Steam Workshop and download designs from other users.
• Supports many video formats including mp4, mov, m4v, and wmv.
• Pause video backgrounds or adjust their playback rate to optimize performance when needed.
• Explorer Studio can run in the background with other Steam games.
